Internet-Draft NTT Internet-Draft NTT
Intended status: Standards Track December 17, 2016 Intended status: Standards Track December 30, 2016
Expires: June 20, 2017 Expires: July 3, 2017
Deprecation of BGP Path Attribute values 30, 31, 129, 241, 242, and 234 Deprecation of BGP Path Attribute values 30, 31, 129, 241, 242, and 243
draft-ietf-idr-deprecate-30-31-129-02 draft-ietf-idr-deprecate-30-31-129-03
Abstract Abstract
This document requests IANA to mark BGP path attribute values 30, 31, This document requests IANA to mark BGP path attribute values 30, 31,
129, 241, 242, and 243 as "deprecated". 129, 241, 242, and 243 as "deprecated".
Status of This Memo Status of This Memo

provisions of BCP 78 and BCP 79. provisions of BCP 78 and BCP 79.
